item.title: Contributing
item.description: Intro You might want to contribute code, content or time to this wiki and are unsure how to do so. Please follow the steps below on how to do so. Note All of these sections mentioning GitHub require a GitHub account! Making Suggestions for Edits If you’re not comfortable writing Markdown or using Git you can make suggestions for edits via our project’s GitHub Issues or open a ticket in our Discord detailing the changes needed.
